name: Game Of Life (itch) (False God)
description:
Game Of Life is a simulation of our daily lives where we constantly face problems dealing with which cause us mental or physical strain thus it is important for us to keep a balance.

You will be followed by problems which you can either destroy individually or "Think Big" and destroy their source which will destroy all of them. But just like our real life new problems will start to haunt you. So your job will be to keep these problems at bay while handling your Physical and Mental Health.
